name: Chocolate Dream Cake
description: Rich chocolate cake layered with chocolate ganache and decorated with chocolate shavings.
ingredients: Flour, cocoa powder, sugar, eggs, butter, milk, dark chocolate, vanilla extract
notes: Our bestselling chocolate cake that's perfect for chocolate lovers.

name: Red Velvet Delight
description: Classic red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting.
ingredients: Flour, cocoa powder, red food coloring, buttermilk, sugar, eggs, butter, cream cheese, vanilla extract
notes: A perfect blend of mild chocolate flavor with velvety smooth texture.

name: Strawberry Bliss Cake
description: Light vanilla cake filled with fresh strawberry compote and topped with strawberry buttercream.
ingredients: Flour, sugar, eggs, butter, milk, vanilla extract, fresh strawberries, strawberry puree
notes: Made with seasonal fresh strawberries for the best flavor.

name: Mango Tango Cake
description: Moist vanilla cake with fresh mango filling and mango buttercream frosting.
ingredients: Flour, sugar, eggs, butter, milk, vanilla extract, fresh mangoes, mango puree, coconut milk (for mango coconut flavor)
notes: Seasonal specialty available during mango season.
allergens: Contains: dairy, eggs, gluten. Mango coconut flavor contains coconut.
